allow: Bash(timeout 30s bundle exec rspec spec/models/panda/cms/user_spec.rb --format documentation)
Bash(PANDA_CMS_USE_GITHUB_ASSETS=false bundle exec rspec spec/system/panda/cms/admin/login_spec.rb::Admin authentication::where provider is::GitHub --format documentation)
Bash(PANDA_CMS_USE_GITHUB_ASSETS=false bundle exec rspec spec/system/panda/cms/admin/login_spec.rb --format documentation)
Bash(RAILS_ENV=test CI=true PANDA_CMS_USE_GITHUB_ASSETS=false bundle exec rspec --tag ~skip -f p)
Bash(RAILS_ENV=test CI=true PANDA_CMS_USE_GITHUB_ASSETS=false bundle exec rspec spec/system/panda/cms/admin/login_spec.rb)
Bash(RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:create db:schema:load)
Bash(RAILS_ENV=test CI=true PANDA_CMS_USE_GITHUB_ASSETS=false bundle exec rspec spec/system/panda/cms/admin/login_spec.rb -f progress)
Bash(RAILS_ENV=test CI=true PANDA_CMS_USE_GITHUB_ASSETS=false bundle exec rspec spec/system --exclude-pattern='**/editorjs/**' -f progress)
Bash(RAILS_ENV=test CI=true PANDA_CMS_USE_GITHUB_ASSETS=false bundle exec rspec spec/system/panda/cms/admin/dashboard_spec.rb -f documentation)
Bash(RAILS_ENV=test CI=true PANDA_CMS_USE_GITHUB_ASSETS=false bundle exec rspec spec/system/panda/cms/admin/dashboard_spec.rb -f progress)
Bash(RAILS_ENV=test CI=true PANDA_CMS_USE_GITHUB_ASSETS=false bundle exec rspec spec/system/panda/cms/admin/pages/edit_page_spec.rb -f progress --example "shows the content of the page being edited")

Bash(RAILS_ENV=test CI=true PANDA_CMS_USE_GITHUB_ASSETS=false bundle exec rspec spec/system/panda/cms/admin/login_spec.rb::Admin authentication::where provider is::GitHub --example "logs in admin successfully")

Bash(RAILS_ENV=test CI=true PANDA_CMS_USE_GITHUB_ASSETS=false bundle exec rspec spec/system/panda/cms/admin/pages/add_page_spec.rb -f progress --example "shows validation errors with invalid details")
Bash(RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails runner "puts Rails.application.routes.url_helpers.try(:panda_cms)&.admin_posts_path rescue ''route not found''")
Bash(RAILS_ENV=test CI=true PANDA_CMS_USE_GITHUB_ASSETS=false bundle exec rspec spec/system/panda/cms/admin/posts/add_post_spec.rb -f progress --example "shows validation errors when URL is missing")

Bash(RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails runner 'puts ""AssetLoader.use_github_assets?: #{Panda::CMS::AssetLoader.use_github_assets?}""; puts ""JavaScript URL: #{Panda::CMS::AssetLoader.javascript_url}""; puts ""Compiled assets available?: #{Panda::CMS::AssetLoader.send(:compiled_assets_available?)}""; puts ""VERSION: #{Panda::CMS::VERSION}""')
Bash(RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails runner 'puts ""Asset tags:""; puts Panda::CMS::AssetLoader.asset_tags')
Bash(RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails runner "puts ''Asset tags:''; puts Panda::CMS::AssetLoader.asset_tags")
Bash(RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails runner "puts ''Asset tags:''; puts Panda::CMS::AssetLoader.asset_tags" --chdir spec/dummy)

Bash(RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails runner "
  require ''panda/cms/asset_helper''
  helper = Class.new { include Panda::CMS::AssetHelper }.new
  puts ''Complete assets output:''
  puts helper.panda_cms_complete_assets
" --chdir spec/dummy)
Bash(INCLUDE_EDITORJS=true bundle exec rspec spec/lib/panda/cms/editor_js/ --format progress)
